description:
DLSS Swapper swap DLSS dlls in games.

DLSS Swapper is a tool that allows you to conveniently download, manage, and swap DLSS dlls allowing you to upgrade or downgrade DLSS version in a game without the game needing an update.
What's Changed
Sorry, this is not the FSR4 update
Work was still continuing on FSR4 as well as a new feature called DLL Sets to enable swapping multiple DLLs at once. Keep an eye out for v1.2.4 though! (sorry again)
Changelog
- Fixed bug where manifest would be replaced with inbuilt manifest, meaning DLSS v310.5.2 would disapear on every launch.
- Changed app to update manifest every launch, not once every 3 hours.
- Renamed DLSS preset "Always use latest" to "NVIDIA recommended" to be in line with NVIDIA App
- Add clear button for searchbox by (@ShulhaOleh in #825)
- Fixes an issue where closing a window while minimized would not make it re-open correctly (by @beeradmoore in #830)
Translation related updates
- Updated German translation (by @melgu in #818)
- Updated Japanese translation (by @Umineko1993 in #817)
- Update Ukrainian translations for improved clarity and consistency (by @CooL16 in #824)
New Contributors
- @melgu made their first contribution in #818
- @CooL16 made their first contribution in #824
- @ShulhaOleh made their first contribution in #825
Full Changelog: v1.2.3.1...v1.2.3.2
